name: @amazon-chime-sdk-messaging-yjs-demo/text-editor
description: The collaborative text editor using the Amazon Chime SDK messaging, Yjs, and Quill
author: Amazom Chime SDK

scripts.sam:deploy:backend: npm run sam:build && cd ../../backend && sam deploy --resolve-s3 --no-fail-on-empty-changeset && aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name amazon-chime-sdk-messaging-yjs-demo --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs' --output json > appconfig.json && cd -
scripts.sam:deploy:assets: npm run build && aws s3 cp dist s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name amazon-chime-sdk-messaging-yjs-demo --query "Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey=='AssetsS3BucketName'].OutputValue" --output text) --recursive
scripts.deploy: npm run sam:deploy:backend && npm run sam:deploy:assets
